name: Potion Run (Fabian Randau, Jonathan Mårtensson, Neva96, Maaaaaaax, ExeQ, Anes Sabanovic)
name_original: Potion Run (Fabian Randau, Jonathan Mårtensson, Neva96, Maaaaaaax, ExeQ, Anes Sabanovic)
description:
Save the neighboring town from the venomous monster by delivering a potion of healing, but be careful, the monster will do everything in its power to stop you. 

A game made in 6 weeks by students at The Game Assembly school in Malmö, Sweden.

Programmers:

Fabian Randau

Alexander Rosendahl

Samuel Ryberg

August Smith

Mateusz Salaga

Animators:

Mattias Ohlsson

Christopher Orantes Diaz

Level Designers:

Jonathan Mårtensson

Tilde Persson

Graphics:

Max Kock

Falke Persson

Gustav Ryde

Anes Sabanovic
